intro: Craft your ride and master the endless journey.
description:
In My Summer Drive, every detail matters. Start with an empty chassis and turn it into a fully functional car, piece by piece. While building your vehicle, you’ll also need to take care of your own survival, exploring a vast rural landscape. Resource management, attention to detail, and smart decisions are the keys to success in a world where any mistake can be fatal.

Key Features:
-Build your car piece by piece – Install the engine, mount the wheels, adjust the carburetor, and fine-tune every detail to create a fully functional vehicle. Be careful – even a small mistake can lead to serious breakdowns!
-Realistic car mechanics – Fuel management, part wear, engine temperature, and even tire pressure all impact your car’s performance. Test, repair, and optimize your vehicle for an authentic mechanic experience.
-Survival and resource management – It’s not just about the car; you also need to take care of you. Hunger, sleep, hygiene, and stress levels affect productivity and your ability to repair the vehicle. You’ll need to manage fuel, food, and water while sometimes finding creative solutions to keep your journey going.

Do you have what it takes to face the ultimate challenge of car mechanics and survival? Get ready to hit the road and turn every journey into a memorable adventure!
